featured.text: In the dream the cloakroom attendant at a theater stopped me in the lobby and insisted on my ___(31)___
I said I had never heard of such a rule at a theater before.
The theater would not be as crowded the second night.
Its worldwide popularity is mainly due to its theme music, which showcases ABBA’s timeless songs in a fresh and vital way 24 retains the essence of both pop music and good musical theater.
When watching a frightening film, people are in the comfort of their own home or theater seats rather than under the threat of any real danger.

definition.zh_def: 一個用於表演戲劇、音樂或其他表演藝術的場所。
definition.en_def: A building or outdoor area where plays, films, or other performances are presented.
definition.example: We went to the theater to watch a new play.
